About Filtering the File Pane

Use filters to restrict which files are displayed in the File pane. This is useful when you want to perform actions on a group of versioned files that match a filterable criteria.

You can restrict the File pane view to only the versioned files that:

  • Match a specified file name pattern (using wildcards)

  • Are locked by specified users or by any user

  • Match a specified promotion group

  • Match a specified version label

  • Differ in terms of revision number, modification time, or revision contents between:

    • Two version labels

    • Two promotion groups

    • A version label and a promotion group

A filtered view affects all open project databases and remains in effect until you select a different filter. To clear a filter and return the File pane to a view of all files, select View | Filter | All Files.

Version Manager Saves Filter Definitions

The last four filters you have defined appear in the filter drop-down list on the toolbar. For example, if you filtered for files locked by user1, then a new option, Locked by 'user1' would appear in the list.

Viewing Files Recursively

By default, the File pane displays only the versioned files located at the root of the item (project database, project, or subproject) you have selected in the Project pane. Unless you select the recursive view, projects, subprojects, and the files contained within nested projects and subprojects are not displayed. To switch between recursive and non-recursive views, click the Recursive/Non-recursive button. The appearance of the button toggles to indicate which filter mode is in effect:

  • Recursive: The File pane displays all projects, subprojects, and versioned files contained within the item selected in the Project pane.

  • Non-recursive: The File pane displays only the versioned files contained at the root of the item selected in the Project pane.

Performing Actions on a Filtered Project

If you perform an action (such as a check out) on a project by selecting it in the Project pane, Version Manager performs the action on the entire project, including any files not displayed by the current filter. To limit an action to only the versioned files displayed by the current filter, select the versioned files in the File pane and then select the action.
